title: SAST in Numbers
yearContent: The Science Association of Southeast University has been established for 31 years, and 2023 is the 32nd year.
programContent: The 27th Science and Technology Festival held 47 interdisciplinary scientific creation competitions.
awardContent: Members of the 32nd executive committee of the Science Association won 290 awards at or above the university level.
peopleContent: The 32nd Science Association of Southeast University has a total of 559 members across all departments.
areaContent: The Science Association has a total of about 362 square meters of activity room space in the University Student Activity Center.
graduateContent: 100% of the graduates in 2020 who were members of the Science Association had a clear career path after graduation.
